title: So MSI Made A New Gaming Pre-Built...
description: *Video Sponsor* Check out some BeQuiet FX Action here:  (Amazon affiliate link)  I bought MSI's new gaming prebuilt and it was a real mixed bag.  The PC in this video:   NZXT H5 Elite:   Get some AWESOME Dawid T-shirts, Mouse pads and more here:   Help us buy weird computers and tech to make videos on by 'Joining' the channel on YouTube here:  Or you can support the channel on Patreon:   *Follow me on whichever Social media you don't hate* Discord:  Twitch:  Twitch bits on YouTube:
transcript: [Music] this is a new gaming pre-built by MSI which should be real interesting considering that the previous one did the PC equivalent of soiling itself on stage so this can only be better
